head.title: As Subway Doors Close, A Last Glance Backward

hedline.hl1: As Subway Doors Close, A Last Glance Backward

block.p: In the end, the Mets were not the Subway Series' Little Engine That Could. They couldn't because the Yankees were the Super Chiefs. Each game of the five-game series was thisclose, but the numbers were really misleading. The Mets didn't have a chance. They were playing against a team whose players responded to moves their manager made. If everything that King Midas touched turned to gold, just about every move Joe Torre made turned into a victory.
